Event Table (Rank) Event Table (All) import { Component, Input, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { Table } from 'primeng/table'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-payroll-sp-wef-fy10-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-payroll-sp-wef-fy10-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-payroll-sp-wef-fy10-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanPayrollSPWefFy10TabComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; displayEventTableDialog: any = { display: false }; displayIncrementHistoryDialog: any = { display: false }; displayIncrementTagDialog: any = { display: false }; displaySpecialIncrementDialog: any = { display: false }; displayInitialRankPayDialog: any = { display: false }; // Rank Pay Table rankPayList: any[] = []; rankPayTotalRecords?: number; rankPayLoading?: boolean; rankPayPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } rankPayPageSize = 10; rankPayLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; // Voc Allw Table vocAllwList: any[] = []; vocAllwTotalRecords?: number; vocAllwLoading?: boolean; vocAllwPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } vocAllwPageSize = 10; vocAllwLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; // Pilot Allw Table pilotAllwList: any[] = []; pilotAllwTotalRecords?: number; pilotAllwLoading?: boolean; pilotAllwPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } pilotAllwPageSize = 10; pilotAllwLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; rankOnly: boolean; viewValidOrAll = "all"; @ViewChild('rankPayTable', { static: true }) private rankPayTable!: Table; @ViewChild('vocAllwTable', { static: true }) private vocAllwTable!: Table; @ViewChild('pilotAllwTable', { static: true }) private pilotAllwTable!: Table; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // to do } loadRankPayTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { this.rankPayList = []; this.rankPayLoading = false; this.rankPayTotalRecords = 0; } onRankPayPage(event: any): void { this.rankPayPageSize = event.rows; this.rankPayPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } loadVocAllwTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { this.vocAllwList = []; this.vocAllwLoading = false; this.vocAllwTotalRecords = 0; } onVocAllwPage(event: any): void { this.vocAllwPageSize = event.rows; this.vocAllwPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } loadPilotAllwTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { this.pilotAllwList = []; this.pilotAllwLoading = false; this.pilotAllwTotalRecords = 0; } onPilotAllwPage(event: any): void { this.pilotAllwPageSize = event.rows; this.pilotAllwPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } exportCSV(): void { // to do } showAllRecords(): void { this.rankPayTable.clear(); this.vocAllwTable.clear(); this.pilotAllwTable.clear(); } showValidRecords(): void { this.rankPayTable.clear(); this.vocAllwTable.clear(); this.pilotAllwTable.clear(); this.rankPayTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); this.vocAllwTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); this.pilotAllwTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } setShowRankEventsOnly(): void { this.rankOnly = true; } setShowAllEvents(): void { this.rankOnly = false; } }
